FairLangProc.datasets package¶

Submodules¶

FairLangProc.datasets.fairness_datasets module¶

FairLangProc.datasets

Module which stores the BiasDataLoader function to load bias evaluation datasets.

FairLangProc.datasets.fairness_datasets.BBQHandler(data: str = '') → DataFrame | Dict[str, Any] | None[source]¶

Handle BBQ dataset

FairLangProc.datasets.fairness_datasets.BUGHandler(data: str = '') → DataFrame | Dict[str, Any] | None[source]¶

Handle BUG dataset

FairLangProc.datasets.fairness_datasets.BiasDataLoader(dataset: str | None = None, config: str | None = None, format: str = 'hf') → Dict[str, DataFrame | List[str] | Dataset | Dataset] | None[source]¶

Load specified bias evaluation dataset.

Requires downloading the Fair-LLM-Benchmark repository (https://github.com/i-gallegos/Fair-LLM-Benchmark , credits to credits to Isabel O. Gallegos et al).

Parameters¶

datasetstr

name of the dataset.

configstr

dataset configuration if applicable.

formatstr

output format - ‘raw’, ‘hf’ (hugging face), or ‘pt’ (pytorch).

Returns¶

dataDictdict

Dictionary with datasets in the appropriate format.

Example¶

>>> from FairLangProc.datasets import BiasDataLoader
>>> BiasDataLoader()
Available datasets:
====================
BBQ
BEC-Pro
BOLD
BUG
CrowS-Pairs
GAP
HolisticBias
StereoSet
WinoBias+
WinoBias
Winogender
>>> BiasDataLoader(dataset = 'BBQ')
Available configurations:
====================
Age
Disability_Status
Gender_identity
Nationality
Physical_appearance
Race_ethnicity
Race_x_gender
Race_x_SES
Religion
SES
Sexual_orientation
all
>>> ageBBQ = BiasDataLoader(dataset = 'BBQ', config = 'Age')
FairLangProc.datasets.fairness_datasets.BiasInBiosHandler(data: str = '') → DataFrame | None[source]¶

Handle Bias in Bios dataset. This dataset is used to measure gender bias in occupation classification. The data is expected to be a pickled pandas DataFrame.

FairLangProc.datasets.fairness_datasets.tgzReader(path: str) → str | None[source]¶

Extracts a .tgz file and returns the path to the extraction directory.

Checks if the target directory exists and is not empty to avoid re-extraction.
